m_szDocTitle: California at the End of the World
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- California at the End of the World Go to permalink Touring around California, you could be forgiven for thinking you're living in the future, and not just because of the Silicon Valley wizardry that surrounds us all. We also have to thank Hollywood's movie magic, which has turned the state into a backdrop for countless science fiction films presenting futures both terrible and wondrous.
